title: YouTube Channel Growth Assistant – Organic Promotion & Engagement
job_overview:
I’m a fast-growing YouTuber focused on storytelling, self-improvement, productivity, and entrepreneurship — and I’m looking for someone who lives and breathes YouTube + social media to help grow my audience organically.

Your job is simple: help get my content seen by the right people — without running ads or buying views. We want real growth, not fake numbers.

Responsibilities:
Research and comment on viral videos in my niche (YouTube Shorts, long-form, self-help, business, mindset).

Help promote my videos subtly in communities (Reddit, Facebook Groups, etc.) without sounding spammy.

Track results: which comments drive views/subs, which platforms bring in traffic.

Suggest collaboration, trend-hacking, and outreach ideas for new growth.

Optional: repurpose content into small Reddit/Twitter threads if you’re a good writer.

Skills Required:
Fluent English (You’ll be writing and commenting for a Western audience).

Social media savvy: knows what viral content looks like, watches YouTube regularly.

Knows how to blend in and promote without being obvious or salesy.

Organized — able to report metrics and progress.

Bonus: Reddit marketing experience.

Hours & Pay:
1–2 hours a day, 5–6 days/week

Pay starts at $Upgrade to see actual info/month depending on experience

Potential for bonuses + long-term growth as the channel scales

Weekly communication through WhatsApp
